tool_description: Extracts text, metadata, and key fields from identity document images using OCR and document parsing capabilities.

image_base64.description: Base64 encoded image of the identity document

document_type.description: Type of document: passport, drivers_license, national_id, or utility_bill

country_code.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code for document origin

error_messages: Invalid image format: Ensure the image is properly base64 encoded and represents a valid image file.
Document type not supported: Use one of [passport, drivers_license, national_id, utility_bill].
Image quality too poor: Provide a clearer, higher resolution image with good lighting and minimal glare.
Invalid country code: Provide a valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.
usage: Provide a base64 encoded image of an identity document along with its type. Optionally specify the country code for better parsing accuracy.

extracted_text.description: Raw text extracted from the document

full_name.description: Full name as appears on document

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format

expiry_date.description: Document expiry date in YYYY-MM-DD format
